<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/memory/settings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows organization administrators to retrieve the current memory settings for their organization.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved memory settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ok":{"const":true},"settings":{"type":"object","properties":{"memoryEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether memory is enabled for the organization"}}}},"required":["ok","settings"]}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ok":{"const":false},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}},"403":{"description":"Forbidden - Admin permissions required","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ok":{"const":false},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
